text: uṅkaḷil cilar tam maṉaiviyarait"tāykaḷ" eṉak kūṟiviṭukiṉṟaṉar, ataṉāl avarkaḷ ivarkaḷuṭaiṭaiya tāykaḷ" (ākiviṭuvatu) illai ivarkaḷaip peṟṟeṭuttavarkaḷ tām ivarkaḷuṭaiya tāykaḷ āvārkaḷ - eṉiṉum, niccayamāka ivarkaḷ collil veṟukkattakkataiyum, poyyāṉataiyumē kūṟukiṟārkaḷ - āṉāl niccayamāka allāh mikavum poṟuppavaṉ, mikavum maṉṉippavaṉ
